thread.title: Getaways Resort Management Shares Details on Upcoming Orlando Cake Fair
thread.title_full: Getaways Resort Management Shares Details on Upcoming Orlando Cake Fair

author: Media Relations
title: Getaways Resort Management Shares Details on Upcoming Orlando Cake Fair
text:
When staying at Imperial Lakes, vacationers are lucky enough to be central to many exciting events and activities. From theme parks to concerts, there is much to see and do in this part of Florida. For a truly unique – and sweet – experience, Getaways Resort Management recommends visitors here head to Orlando from Sept. 18 to 20 for the Americas Cake & Sugarcraft Fair.
Hosted by Satin Ice, this expo is open to both trade and the public. Events over the three-day event include Cake Central’s Sugar Arts Fashion Show; a Live Global Cake Challenge; traditional cake competitions; and more than 75 hands-on classes and demonstrations taught by 40 of the world’s best cake artists. According to Getaways Resort Management, there will also be chocolate, wedding, kids and sugar art zones.
Celebrity chefs will also be on hand offering classes and demonstrations. These world-renowned cake artists include Mich Turner, Ron Ben-Israel, Roland Mesnier, and Buddy Valastro, star of TLC’s “Cake Boss.” Getaways Resort Management says this event is the first cake fair of its kind in the U.S. to get these four craftsmen under one roof.
In order to participate in and attend the hands-on classes, demonstrations, and competitions, Cake Central’s Sugar Arts Fashion Show visitors must register. Prices right now are $19.95 for a one-day badge, $39.90 for a two-day badge, and $59.85 for a three-day badge.
The Americas Cake & Sugarcraft Fair is an international cake show. According to the fair’s official website, it “promises to be one of the most exciting and dynamic cake shows in the world with an anticipated 30,000 in attendance, more than 150 vendors, and global media attention.” Getaways Resort Management says the inaugural show, which takes place at the Orange County Convention Center, is expected to attract a varied group of professional cake artists and decorators, pastry chefs, sugar sculptors, chocolatiers and hobbyists from around the globe. To learn more about this event, Imperial Lakes guests can visit http://www.cakefair.com .
Getaways Resort Management has carefully crafted a number of unique strategies that will offer unmatched solutions to those who have invested in vacation ownership. With these game winning strategies, a proven record of success, and a commitment to creating lasting relationships with its clients, Getaways Resort Management offers the most extraordinary and up to date solutions in the industry. To learn more please visit http://www.getawaysresorts.com .
###
Press release distributed by JW Maxx Solutions, a leader in content management solutions and part of a family of companies that includes Enterate Ahora .
